survey_name: Post-Event Feedback Survey for Tech Conference Attendees
survey_brief: This survey collects feedback from attendees of the Annual Tech Innovators Conference to evaluate their experience, session quality, and suggestions for future improvements.

questions.question_text: How satisfied were you with the overall conference experience?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for clear sentiment measurement.

script.question_text: How satisfied were you with the overall conference experience?

questions.question_text: Which conference sessions did you attend? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture full attendee engagement.

script.question_text: Which conference sessions did you attend? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: On a scale of 1-5, how valuable did you find the networking opportunities? (1 = Not valuable, 5 = Extremely valuable)
questions.client_notes: Use a numeric scale for quantifiable feedback.

script.question_text: On a scale of 1-5, how valuable did you find the networking opportunities? (1 = Not valuable, 5 = Extremely valuable)

questions.question_text: What was the most impactful takeaway from the conference for you?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative insights.

script.question_text: What was the most impactful takeaway from the conference for you?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend this conference to a colleague?
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no/maybe to gauge advocacy potential.

script.question_text: Would you recommend this conference to a colleague?
